citation.article-title: Thalassobacter stenotrophicus Maci치n et al. 2005 is a later synonym of Jannaschia cystaugens Adachi et al. 2004, with emended description of the genus Thalassobacter.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Thalassobacter Maci치n et al. 2005
The description is identical to that given by Maci치n et al. (2005a) with the following amendments.
Major polar lipids are phosphatidylglycerol, diphosphatidylglycerol and phosphatidylcholine.
Also contain two unidentified phospholipids and an unidentified aminolipid, but not phosphatidylethanolamine.
